title: Chocolate fudge layer cake
ingredients: ['For the cake', '110g margarine, at room temperature', '220g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '220g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt', 'For the icing', '110g margarine, at room temperature', '85g chocolate, melted', '300g icing sugar', '4 tablespoons hot water', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
